reviews.customers_say: Customers find the tunic comfortable, cute, and well-fitting, with great quality and good durability, with one customer noting it holds up well through multiple washes. The softness and cut receive mixed feedback, with some customers finding it soft while others describe it as rough, and some mentioning the oversized design.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute!!
items.body: Super oversized but love the color, quality & it's comfortable. Read more
items.author: Lex

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute, but very oversized!!!
items.body: This is an adorable sweater! However, it runs very very oversized. True size is XL, originally ordered a large. Had to return and downsize to a medium. Size down even with a fuller figure/bust/large shoulders. Quality is great and it has held up through multiple washes Read more
items.author: Natalie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love Free People
items.body: Comfy and cozy oversized sweater. Great quality and great for cold days. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality
items.body: As expected for Free People this is a great quality shirt. It is definitely oversized so size down if you donâ€™t like a REALLY big fit. I will say it seems more like a â€œsweater â€œ than a sweatshirt. Look closely at the cloth in the pictures it is textured. Free People has great stuff. Read more
items.author: Diane

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size Down!
items.body: I really wanted to love this sweater but Iâ€™d definitely recommend sizing down probably 2 whole sizes. Iâ€™m usually an XXL but in free people I wear a L-XL. I got the XL to be safe but it was far too big and honestly the cut of the sweater is strange. It kind of bubbles out at the bottom and creates a weird silhouette if your stomach is something you try to hide! Read more
items.author: Lderocco96

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars DOLMAN SLEEVE AUTUMN WINTER SWEATER PERFECTION
items.body: THIS IS THE PERFECT LAYERING SWEATER OR EVENING-WEAR FOR THOSE CHILLIER SUMMER NIGHTS...Pairs well with Yoga Pants, Scruffy Jeans or Dress Slacks...ALSO LOOKS AMAZING WITH A PENCIL SKIRT and STILETTOS. GLAD TO SEE DOLMAN (a sleeve that is very wide at the top of the arm and narrows towards the wrist or elbow, cut in one piece with the body of the garment.) SLEEVES MAKING A SWEATER COMEBACK. short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Cherry, Inca Gold, Pale Rosette, Black, Sea Garden, Painted White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
